text: God ne yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, yad nɨbop keke mɨdupsek anɨgɨl agebin. Nɨbi chɨn yɨb awl dɨl, yɨb chɨn adek alaŋ yek binɨb ogɨnap yɨb kɨli ayaŋ mɨdeb agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Pen gos nɨgtep gɨl, God nɨbop gek nop gos lɨnepɨm ak nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Nɨŋɨd, tap nɨbi ke gɨpɨm ak sek gos nepɨm ak sek tɨg asɨkɨnɨmɨb.
